summary: Comprehensive testing of Free Fire Diamond Top-Up Platform (Nex-Store) completed. All 26 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tests passed for user login, TopUp page, Wallet page, Admin login, Admin Dashboard, and Admin Orders with filtering.
critical_code_review_comments: All prices correctly converted from paisa to rupees for display
Admin orders filtering by status working correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: User login/logout, Admin login, Admin Dashboard with stats (Total Sales ₹4.50, Total Orders 14, Failed Orders 0, Wallet Balance ₹997.03), Admin Orders page with filtering (All/Success/Pending Payment/Processing/Failed/Manual Review), TopUp page with wallet balance and Bangladesh server, Wallet page with transaction history. Backend APIs all return correct data with prices in rupees (converted from paisa). No mocked APIs - all real implementations.

features_tested.user_login: PASS - testclient/test123 credentials work, wallet balance ₹997.03 displayed
features_tested.topup_page_packages: PASS - All 12 packages displayed with correct prices (25 Diamonds ₹0.99, 50 Diamonds ₹1.99, etc.)
features_tested.uid_validation: PASS - Error shown for UID less than 8 digits ('Player UID must be at least 8 digits')
features_tested.order_creation: PASS - Orders created successfully with valid 8+ digit UID
features_tested.wallet_page: PASS - Balance ₹997.03 displayed, 6 transactions in history, Add Funds button visible
features_tested.admin_dashboard: PASS - Stats cards displayed (Total Sales ₹4.50, Total Orders 14, Failed Orders 0, Wallet Balance ₹997.03)
features_tested.admin_orders_list: PASS - 14 total orders displayed with correct prices
features_tested.admin_orders_filtering: PASS - Filtering by status works (5 pending_payment, 1 success, 14 total)

api_tests_summary.TestUserAuthentication: 2/2 passed - login success and invalid credentials
api_tests_summary.TestAdminAuthentication: 2/2 passed - login success and invalid credentials
api_tests_summary.TestPackagesAPI: 5/5 passed - list packages, diamond/membership/evo types, price format
api_tests_summary.TestAdminDashboard: 2/2 passed - stats structure and auth required
api_tests_summary.TestAdminOrders: 4/4 passed - list orders, filter by status, price format
